metadata.title: CVE-2024-45336 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The HTTP client drops sensitive headers after following a cross-domainredirect. For example, a request to a.com/ containing an Authorizationheader which is redirected to b.com/ will not send that header to b.com. Inthe event that the client received a subsequent same-domain redirect,however, the sensitive headers would be restored. For example, a chain ofredirects from a.com/, to b.com/1, and finally to b.com/2 would incorrectlysend the Authorization header to b.com/2.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
